basics.summary: A PhD student at GSFS, the University of Tokyo, studying ACI (Animal-Computer Interaction), HCI (Human-Computer Interaction), and IoT (Internet of Things).

work.name: teamlab
work.summary: Learning theoretical knowledge and practical programming of GPGPU. Conceptualizing and implementing a BOIDS-based interactive digital art project by self.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
